sense.def:
A trial
je sodni postopek, v katerem sodnik in porota poslušata dokaze in se odločita, ali je nekdo kriv ali ne.

seg.quote: She won't get a fair trial.
Huey was awaiting trial for murder.

sense.def:
A trial
je tudi postopek, v katerem nekaj preskušamo.

seg.quote: We've completed a number of fairly successful trials with laboratory animals.

sense.def:
One's trials
so neprijetne stvari, ki jih nekdo doživlja.

Kadar je nekdo
on trial
, mu sodijo na sodišču.

seg.quote: We don't intend to put him on trial.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
on trial
, tisto preskušamo ali podrobno preučujemo.

seg.quote: The Parliamentary system is on trial.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj delamo
by trial and error
, preskušamo različne načine, kako bi tisto naredili, dokler ne najdemo pravega.
